description: This table contains the link to the note containing the internal laboratory comments for an order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LAB_COMMENTS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record that contains the internal laboratory comments for this order.
